thread.title: Grizzlies talk to hilariously clueless fans
thread.title_full: Grizzlies talk to hilariously clueless fans

author: USA TODAY
title: Grizzlies talk to hilariously clueless fans
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Grizzlies talk to hilariously clueless fans Whoops. Grizzlies talk to hilariously clueless fans Whoops. Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/memphis-grizzlies-zach-randolph-dunk-contest-interview-nba-all-star-weekend-funny-video/ Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Grizzlies talk to hilariously clueless fans Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 5:12 p.m. ET Feb. 18, 2017 
Memphis Grizzlies forward Zach Randolph (50) and Memphis Grizzlies guard Mike Conley (11) during the second half against the Phoenix Suns at FedExForum. Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Phoenix Suns 110-91. (Photo: Justin Ford-USA TODAY Sports) 
Memphis Grizzlies digital content reporter Alexis Morgan decided to ask fans at All-Star weekend in New Orleans about whether or not they're excited to see Zach Randolph in the Dunk Contest on Saturday. 
The thing is, Randolph isn't in the Dunk Contest. He's actually not even involved in All-Star weekend. The Grizzlies' Marc Gasol is the one who'll represent the team in the All-Star Game. 
Some of these fans are going to be very disappointed when they find out. People are PUMPED to see Zach Randolph in tonight's Slam Dunk Contest! #NBAAllStar #VoteZBO pic.twitter.com/b28ADSNXoV â€” Memphis Grizzlies (@memgrizz) February 18, 2017 
A few of them say they don't think Randolph has a chance, but some of them say that they're pumped and would like to see him get an unlikely win. 
Hopefully Randolph is shown this video soon. Surely he'd get a kick out of it. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/memphis-grizzlies-zach-randolph-dunk-contest-interview-nba-all-star-weekend-funny-video/ Most Popular
